title: Marathon ClickTight: Securing Your Child
description:
How to secure your child in a Britax Marathon ClickTight convertible car seat. 
**Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText:
How to secure your child in a Britax Marathon ClickTight convertible car seat. 
**Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.
For more information about Britax ClickTight convertible car seats, visit http://www.britaxusa.com/clicktight-convertibles

transcripts: To properly harness your child, loosen the harness by pushing the harness adjuster button and pulling both harness straps forward. Open the chest clip and buckle. Attach the harness straps to the harness holders. Place your child in the seat ensuring that they are sitting upright and not slouching with their back up against the child seat back. Position the harness straps around your child then fasten the buckle. Check the proper harness height. And pull any excess slack up to your child's shoulder area before tightening. Pull the adjuster strap up and away from the child seat to tighten until the harness is snug around your child's. A snug strap should not allow you to pinch excess at the shoulder. Close the chest clip and position at your child's armpit level. Adjust the chest pads to be comfortable within range of the correctly position just clip.
